item.title: ‘Systems-driven exploration game’ Kill Joy announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Inspired by The Outer Wilds.

The Last Hero of Nostalgaia developer Over The Moon has announced Kill Joy, a “systems-driven exploration game” where players must escape a nightmare of rainbows and unicorns by making its happy creatures cry. It is inspired by The Outer Wilds. It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A systems-driven exploration game where foul language is your only tool—and the world reacts in ways you’d never expect. Escape a deceptive nightmare of rainbows and unicorns by making its happy creatures cry.

A Genre With No Name

Kill Joy is an experiment in complex systems design where a single interaction (swearing) can produce many consequences. That also means that because exploring the rules of the system is the fun part, we won’t hold your hand. You’ll have to make sense of this insane world yourself.

Swearing is Not Combat—It’s How You Explore

In Kill Joy, you don’t shoot, punch, or cast spells. You swear.

Swearing at creatures is how you interact with this world. Sometimes a creature laughs, sometimes it panics, and sometimes it weeps—and when it cries, the illusion breaks. Every reaction is a mechanical clue. Every rude word is a probe into the rules of a place that desperately wants you happy, calm, and blind.

A Pastoral Hell

On the surface, this world is a manic dream of rainbow meadows, talking bunnies, and friendly unicorns. Underneath, something is very wrong:

  • Happy creatures with glossy, empty eyes.
  • Joyful clouds humming in unsettling harmony.
  • Perfect little critters who desperately want you to smile.

You know better. You can feel something gnawing at the edges.

Break the Illusion

Some illusions are “anchored” to certain entities. Their happiness is a spell holding reality together. Make them cry, and the spell cracks. Behind each illusion is something real:

  • Hidden passages.
  • Suppressed memories.
  • Twisted, half-digested hints left by previous victims.
  • And the scattered fragments of your own mind.

Reassemble Your Mind

Your mind has been shattered and projected outward onto the landscape. Each dispelled illusion yields:

  • A word.
  • A question.
  • A fragment of meaning.

Piece them together through small, elegant deduction challenges. Rebuild the logic of your thinking. Recover your identity. Find out what’s eating you—and why.

If you’re tired of games that tell you what to feel, where to go, and how to think…

If you want something genuinely new…

If you’re ready to swear at a unicorn until reality fractures—.

Welcome to Kill Joy.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Modern-fantasy London-set co-op action game Cast Outs announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

London Studio's fantasy co-op combat game lives?

Twisted Works, a new studio established in 2024 by eight founding members who met at Sony Interactive Entertainment subsidiary London Studio, has announced Cast Outs, a modern-fantasy cooperative action game set in a mythically reimagined London. It will be available for PlayStation 5 , Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, with an early access beta planned for release in early 2027.

While not specifically mentioned, the project appears to be the creative successor to the fantasy London-set online cooperative combat game previously in the works at London Studio before Sony Interactive Entertainment closed the developer in February 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Twisted Works:

About

Cast Outs brings you the pure spectacle of magic where spellcasting hits with the physical impact of a brawler and the immediate kick of a shooter. Dive into the ultimate magical urban battleground where you and your friends can truly cooperate, regardless of skill level. It’s the perfect balance of quick-fix fun and high-octane action, built to be played together.

Key Features

  • A New Standard for Magic Combat – Your powers hit with the impact of a brawler and the immediacy of a shooter, delivering a new standard for magical combat. Feel every strike, every blast, every synergy as your squad turns the city into an epic battleground.
  • True Cooperative Power – Alone you’re dangerous. Together you’re unstoppable. Discover endless ways your squad’s powers combine, creating unforgettable moments of synergy.
  • Evolving Heroes – Swap between unique heroes, each with evolving playstyles and strategies to master. Experiment, remix, and find your perfect team dynamic.
  • Unpredictable Runs – No two runs play the same. Power-shifting mutators and upgrades transform your abilities, keeping every battle fresh and unpredictable.
  • An Iconic London Under Siege – Orcs, ogres, wraiths, dragons. Face an onslaught across iconic London landmarks, defending your city against an invasion.
  • Blockbuster Sessions – 20 minutes or all night, Cast Outs delivers high-octane action, with zero grind, immediate fun, and endlessly replayable action built for friends.
  • Different Ways to Play – Fight back in two-, three-, or four-player cooperative play through combat runs, escort missions, horde survival, speed runs, and challenge modes.
  • ❮
  • ❯

FAQ

  • What is Cast Outs?
    • A century ago, fantasy beings from a dying world escaped through a dimensional rift. Many landed on Earth. Since then, magic is real, myths have moved in, and the fabled live side by side with humans in relative peace. Present day and the rifts are back… but this time they bring sinister threats into our world. You and your friends team up as the new generation of fabled citizens whose forgotten powers are awakened by the return of the rifts—you must master your emerging and growing magical abilities to fight the invasion and save the city you now call home.
  • What genre is it?
    • The game genre is online multiplayer cooperative action. The genre for the setting is urban fantasy. It blends and deconstructs fantasy and folklore, twisting them into a brand new reality set in London. It’s a familiar backdrop intertwined with fantastical wonder, delivering a sense of newness and nostalgia, discovery and familiar favorites. It’s fantasy in a modern jacket.
  • What’s the core gameplay loop?
    • Squads of players face overwhelming enemies and supernatural threats, creating high-stakes cooperative moments where success depends on teamwork. Run-based missions call upon players to employ their fluid magical traversal and visceral spell-casting to defeat threats that stand between them and their objectives. Players will utilize tight combat, special moves, team synergies, tag-team casting and team-up moves to save the city from invasion or liberate occupied districts.
  • Is it open-world?
    • It’s not open-world. We want every district, every street, and every corner to be filled with fun activities and encounters. Using wide-linear maps, we balance large urban playgrounds, which are ripe for player-driven chaos and emergent gameplay, with scripted set-pieces that deliver boss-like encounters and epic moments, set against iconic backgrounds.
  • What’s the maximum number of players?
    • Currently, the game supports two-to-four players.
  • Are there player-versus-player modes?
    • At this time, we are focused on delivering the best player-versus-environment experience, but in the future, we look forward to opening up more modes and different ways to play.
  • Can I play single player?
    • No. We have an ambition to deliver an uncompromising, true cooperative experience where players are not simply side by side but connected by the gameplay. The nature of our design is that you need at least one teammate to amplify your powers. It’s a playground for you, your friends and the community.
  • What platforms are you supporting?
    • We believe in a cross-platform ecosystem and plan to release Cast Outs on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series. In the post-launch growth phase, we will explore opportunities to publish Cast Outs on Switch 2.
  • How much will it cost?
    • Cast Outs is a mid-tier, premium game with a price that is yet to be determined.
  • When do you plan to launch?
    • We are entering production soon and plan to release an early access beta in early 2027.
  • Will a public demo be available?
    • We plan to release a playable demo to the public soon and eagerly await the opportunity to put the game into more players’ hands. Some decisions we have to make include platform strategy, cross play support, input devices, and language support, whilst we also continue working on optimization, hardware compatibility, bug fixing, and store / platform compliance.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: REPLACED launches March 12, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Xbox Series

Science-fiction retro-futuristic action platformer finally dated.

Science-fiction retro-futuristic action platformer REPLACED will launch for Xbox Series and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG, and Microsoft Store on March 12, 2026, publisher Thunderful Games and developer Sad Cat Studios announced. It will also be available via Game Pass.

“It feels great to finally have a set date for the release of REPLACED,” said game director Yura Zhdanovich in a press release. “It’s no secret that it’s taken longer for us to get here than we initially thought and we want to thank everyone for your continued patience and support. We’re looking forward to making it worth your while on March 12!”

Here is an overview of the game, via Thunderful Games:

Uncover the sinister secrets of Phoenix Corporation, through the eyes of its own creation, R.E.A.C.H. – an AI trapped in a human body against its will. In an alternate 1980s America reshaped by nuclear catastrophe, Phoenix-City has become one of the Corporation’s strongholds – a haven for corruption where outlaws thrive and human life is traded like currency. Step into the role of R.E.A.C.H., expose the Corporation’s hidden agenda, and uncover the purpose behind your creation.

REPLACED is a 2.5D cinematic action platformer wrapped in an intense cyberpunk thriller narrative. Run, climb, and fight through crumbling districts, industrial wastelands, and neon-lit alleys with fluid movement and fast, responsive combat. Chain precise melee strikes with satisfying ranged attacks to take down enemies in high-intensity encounters while keeping the flow of exploration.

Explore themes of humanity, identity, and control through morally complex characters and the slow reveal of a world pushed to its limits. Feel it being brought to life with hand-crafted pixel art enhanced by modern visual effects, while a moody, synth-driven soundtrack sets the tone. REPLACED delivers a single-player journey that blends cinematic platforming, fast-paced action, and a tense cyberpunk thriller narrative. Immerse yourself in a world where every secret – and every life – has a price.

Watch a new trailer below.
